section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 3814 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).
